title: Spider Dance

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit someone at night, giving them a donut. It's the same as Pinata's candy. You can eat it during the night to be healed and purged. However, your target will be in debt.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who are in debt will sell a donut to everyone they visit at night. Those players will gain a donut but they'll be in debt too.
- Every player can only get 1 donut.
- You have a spider army who will protect you from the first Basic attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Force everyone other than you to be in debt, so you can save all of the spiders!

desc:
Post 488
*I heard you're awfully stingy with your money...*
